author: nick
msg: Upgrade the Maven Shade plugin - slightly faster, and avoids spurious warnings about duplicate xmlbeans classes

author: nick
msg: TIKA-879 Add a new parent mime type, for the text based message formats, of text/x-tika-text-based-message, which allows Thunderbird messages to be correctly detected as they now show up as being text based not binary based in the hierarchy

author: nick
msg: One more media type with parameters test, for unknown parameters
